## PolyAsyncIterable.async() method

Return `this`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
async(): PolyAsyncIterable<T>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

PolyAsyncIterable&lt;T&gt;

A [PolyAsyncIterable](./polyethylene.polyasynciterable.md) that yields the same elements as `this`

## Remarks

This method is present in this class for compatibility with [PolySyncIterable.async()](./polyethylene.polysynciterable.async.md)<!-- -->, but it's never necessary to call it for anything.
